description.narrative: Project focuses on three areas: 1) Providing support for competence and skills development to independent medias and CSOs in Nicaragua Honduras and El Salvador to improve financial sustainability and reduce dependency on external funding. To achieve greate r self-sustainability organizations need training in business development marketing and sales as well as in strategic planning and effective management; 2) Supporting networking and cooperation between independent medias journalists and CSOs to encourage c ooperation in defending the operating environment for media and civil society. Also training in topical issues (e.g. managing security risks) is provided; 3) Providing training and support to medias CSOs and independent journalists to produce high-quality information and investigative stories that provide divergent information and viewpoints compared to mainstream media and attract wide audiences.Partnership agreements will be continued with El Faro Onda Local and Centro Humboldt. Support will be given to c apacity development in business and marketing development of investigative journalism and to partners' independent content productions. Journalists and partner medias continue to network together through co-productions based on common investigative journal ism methods. In Honduras the difficult political situation and security issues pose challenges for action. Therefore Vikes support will focus on organizing activities and supporting content production and networking of few identified independent medias and CSOs while mapping out potential partner organizations for more close cooperation during 2020.During the second project phase we are also going to enhance the networking component of the project by bringing independent medias journalists and CSOs together . The idea behind is to enhance mutual learning and provide training but also to support cooperation for defending freedom of expression access to information as well as for improving the operating environment for both.
